amendment.description: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following: SECTION 1. TAXPAYER OPTION TO CONTRIBUTE OWN FUNDS TO PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION CAMPAIGNS (a) IN GENERAL. - Section 6096 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows. ***.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Moore amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Moore.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Moore.
